name: Battle Fantasia
description:
Battle Fantasia, a fighting game set in a world of swords and sorcery! Designed with a system that is easy to learn but difficult to master, Battle Fantasia is fun for casual and expert gamers! Twenty-four storylines are brought to life with incredible graphics and twelve fully-voiced characters.
